abstract: Perhaps someday a television network will produce a reality show about the competition between rival reality shows. On Wednesday, when each broadcast network had scheduled an unscripted series at 8 p.m., Fox’s lie detector show “The Moment of Truth” won the showdown with 10.4 million viewers and a 4.1 rating in the 18- to 49-year-old demographic.
lead_paragraph: Perhaps someday a television network will produce a reality show about the competition between rival reality shows. On Wednesday, when each broadcast network had scheduled an unscripted series at 8 p.m., Fox’s lie detector show “The Moment of Truth” won the showdown with 10.4 million viewers and a 4.1 rating in the 18- to 49-year-old demographic.
